aboutPage.heroIntro1: UniStart Hub is a centralized digital platform to identify, develop, and turn innovative startup initiatives of talented students, vocational and school students, and underserved youth in remote villages into real digital products at MVP level.
aboutPage.heroIntro2: The project aims to unlock youth potential, create equal opportunities, and expand the innovation ecosystem.
aboutPage.goalCard1Desc: Identify innovative ideas of talented youth and provide professional support.
aboutPage.goalCard2Desc: Turn startup ideas into real digital products at MVP (Minimum Viable Product) level.
aboutPage.goalCard3Desc: Evaluation and analysis of projects by professional experts.
aboutPage.goalCard4Desc: All processes are digitized and transparent; every step is tracked.
aboutPage.whoFor1Title: University students, vocational and school students
aboutPage.whoFor1Desc: Talented students and learners in higher education and schools.
aboutPage.whoFor3Desc: Professional experts in startups and innovation.
aboutPage.whoFor4Desc: Organizations and partners interested in developing the startup ecosystem.
aboutPage.how1Desc: Users submit their startup ideas to the platform.
aboutPage.how2Desc: Experts and admins review projects in detail.
aboutPage.how3Desc: Each project gets a status (Accepted, Pending, Rejected).
aboutPage.how4Desc: Experts leave detailed feedback on the project.
aboutPage.how5Desc: Accepted projects are taken to MVP level.
aboutPage.benefit1Desc: All processes are transparent and tracked; every step is documented.
aboutPage.benefit2Desc: Data is stored securely; only authorized users have access.
aboutPage.benefit3Desc: You get notified as soon as project status changes.
aboutPage.benefit4Desc: All projects are managed and monitored at a professional level.

helpPage.heroSubtitle: Guide and answers for using the UniStart Hub platform
helpPage.faq1A: UniStart Hub is a centralized digital platform to identify, develop, and turn youth innovative startup ideas into real digital products at MVP level. Through the platform you can submit your project and track its review and development by experts.
helpPage.faq2Q: How do I submit a project?
helpPage.faq2A: Submitting a project is easy! Click "Submit project" in the sidebar, then fill in the project name, idea description, and contact details. You can optionally upload a file. Fill in the form and click "Submit".
helpPage.faq3Q: When will my project be reviewed?
helpPage.faq3A: Submitted projects are reviewed by admins and experts soon. Each project gets a status: Pending (under review), Accepted, or Rejected. You receive real-time notifications.
helpPage.faq4Q: What if my project is rejected?
helpPage.faq4A: If your project is rejected, you get a notification and experts leave feedback. You can resubmit as a new project or improve and resubmit based on expert recommendations.
helpPage.faq5Q: How do admins and experts work?
helpPage.faq5A: Admins and experts review, evaluate projects, and assign statuses. They leave detailed feedback and recommendations. The process is transparent and digital.
helpPage.faq6A: Notifications are sent as soon as project status changes — on review, status change, or expert feedback. You can see all notifications via the bell icon in the top bar.
helpPage.faq7Q: Where do I change profile and settings?
helpPage.faq7A: Open the profile menu in the top bar and go to "Personal info" or "Settings". There you can update your details.
helpPage.guide1Desc: First sign up to access the platform. On the sign-up page enter name, email, and password.
helpPage.guide2Desc: After signing up, fill in your profile details. They are used when submitting projects.
helpPage.guide3Desc: Click "Submit project" in the sidebar and enter project details. You can optionally upload a file.
helpPage.guide4Desc: Your submitted project is reviewed by admins and experts. This may take a few days.
helpPage.guide5Desc: When project status changes you get a notification. See all updates via the bell icon in the top bar.
helpPage.guide6Desc: Accepted projects are taken to MVP level and you can track results.
helpPage.contactDesc: If you have questions or run into an issue, contact us through the channels below.

developersPage.heroSubtitle: Founder and project lead of UniStart Hub
developersPage.aboutText1: I am Doniyor Ergashev, founder and project lead of UniStart Hub. The platform was created to turn startup ideas of talented students and underserved youth in remote areas into real MVP products.
developersPage.aboutText2: My main goal is to unlock youth potential, create equal opportunities, and expand the innovation environment.
developersPage.why3: Experienced guidance and expert input are needed
developersPage.why4: UniStart Hub was created to fill this gap
developersPage.goal3: Bring startups to the real market
developersPage.goal4: Create a sustainable innovation ecosystem for youth

public.aboutP1: UniStart Hub is a digital innovation ecosystem that brings together universities, colleges, schools, and organizations working with youth. The platform enables submitting startup projects, evaluating them, monitoring progress, and making decisions in a single, transparent, and convenient environment.
public.aboutP2: Through UniStart Hub, projects are accepted in a centralized system, evaluated by sector experts, and every stage is tracked in real time. This reduces human error and makes processes faster, fair, and digitized.
public.aboutP3: For students, the platform is a space to present their ideas; for universities, a tool to identify talent; for organizations and agencies, a modern solution for selecting and supporting promising projects.
public.aboutP4: UniStart Hub is not just a platform — it is a bridge that turns youth initiatives into real results.
public.footerText: UniStart Hub — startup ideas platform. All general statistics are results for our country.
